text: The Kuala Lumpur Tower, also known as KL Tower, is a tall tower in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It's 421 meters tall, making it the world's seventh-tallest tower. There's a restaurant at the top where you can see the whole city. Construction started in 1991, and it opened to the public in 1996. Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad oversaw its construction and officially opened it. Category:Towers in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Kuala Lumpur Category:Mahathir Mohamad
title: Kuala Lumpur Tower
